Todo.title: Todo
Todo.description: Represents a single task or reminder.

dueDate.description: Optional due date for the task.

familyMemberId.description: The UID of the family member who created the task.

FamilyMember.title: FamilyMember
FamilyMember.description: Represents a member of the family using the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the family member.

name.description: The name of the family member.

email.description: Email address of the family member.

color.description: Color associated with the family member for UI representation.

Expense.title: Expense
Expense.description: Represents an expense recorded by a family member.

familyMemberId.description: The UID of the family member who recorded the expense.

categoryId.description: Reference to Category. (Relationship: Category 1:N Expense) The category of the expense.

date.description: The date the expense was incurred.

isPrivate.description: If true, the expense is only visible to the owner.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category for expenses (e.g., Groceries, Transportation).

familyMemberId.description: The UID of the family member who created the category.

isCommon.description: Indicates if the category is common to all family members or specific to one.

isPrivate.description: If true, this category and its expenses are only visible to the owner.

Budget.title: Budget
Budget.description: Represents a budget set for a specific category over a period.

familyMemberId.description: The UID of the family member who set the budget.

amount.description: The budget amount for the category in the specified period.

startDate.description: The start date of the budget period.

endDate.description: The end date of the budget period.

RecurringPayment.title: RecurringPayment
RecurringPayment.description: Represents a recurring payment or subscription.

id.description: Unique identifier for the recurring payment.

familyMemberId.description: The UID of the family member who created the payment.

description.description: A description of the payment (e.g., Netflix Subscription).

nextDueDate.description: The next date the payment is due.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is now centralized to allow data sharing among all users. Collections like 'expenses', 'categories', and 'budgets' are at the root level. Data access is controlled by security rules: all authenticated users can read data, but only the document's owner (matched via the 'familyMemberId' field) can write, update, or delete it. This ensures data visibility for the whole family while maintaining individual ownership of records.
